DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to find out if people with Prader-Willi syndrome have a difference in the protein which changes inactive cortisone to the active stress hormone cortisol.
DOC.brief_title: Cortisol Activity in Patients With Prader-Willi Syndrome and Healthy Controls
DOC.criteria: PraderWilli syndrome confirmed by molecular testing, ages 6 months to adult Controls: Agematched, sexmatched, developmentally normal, BMIcontrolled healthy or obese subjects PWS subjects without molecular confirmation of the diagnosis Subjects receiving glucocorticoid treatment within 3 months of evaluation Subjects receiving growth hormone within one year prior to analysis
